issue.title: [C++] Implement hash_aggregate approximate quantile kernel
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13520](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13520). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement a hash aggregate approximate quantile kernel. We have a scalar aggregate version of this (named `tdigest`) using t-digest.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13520?focusedCommentId=17393231) by David Li (lidavidm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 10860
